data.introduce: 票面信息提取服务是用于从主机中查询对应的票面信息的服务，对应的主机指令是DETR。
data.functions:
根据票号提取票面信息
 根据PNR号提取票面信息
 根据身份证或者护照提取票面信息(返回系统包含前后两天共五天的航段，航段状态为OPEN FOR USE的票面)

									当Code传CN时，Value则录入客票关联的订座记录编码；
									当Code传NI,ID,UU,PP四种证件代码之一时，，Value传SSR FOID或SSR DOCS录入的证件号。
									当Code传NM时，Value传姓名。","children":[]}]},{"name":"@EchoToken","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@TimeStamp","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@Version","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@Target","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@OnlyOpenInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"根据证件号提取客票信息，是否只提取OPEN票，默认false","children":[]},{"name":"@AllTaxes","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"为 true 时，显示全部税项","children":[]},{"name":"@SysType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"C","description":"默认值"CRS"(C 系统)输入
"CRS"或者不输入调用 C 系
统","children":[]}]}]
